compress.long_description: By default every individual has a unique vertical slot. This can be inefficient with many generations. This algorithm lets several people share a vertical slot, if they do not overlap.

flip_to_optimize.short_description: Flip families to reduce vertical connections
flip_to_optimize.long_description: Switch the position of mother and father in a family, to reduce the overall vertical cross connections in larger graphs (pedigree collapse).

fathers_have_the_same_color.long_description: Starting from the root person, each father of an added individual has the same color as that individual.
